description: A crispy snack with a delicious chocolate and orange addition.
keywords: Rice pudding,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Rice,Chocolate,Peanut free
name: Chocolate Orange Rice Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the rice as per packet instructions and allow to drain and cool fully.
In a mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice with the rest of the ingredients and combine fully.
Divide the mixture into 4 patties and pack together tightly.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat and then add the butter to melt for 30 seconds.
Fry the rice cakes for 6 minutes in total but flipping over after 3 minutes.
Allow the cakes to cool before serving.
